title: Telekinetic Mastery
desc:
Post 371
- Calculate your :arcane: resistance, which is the number of <:blue:1106234079055200378> cards in your hand * 10%. This card's <:impact:1106704414225485894> value is 5 plus (5 * your :arcane: resistance).
- Choose a card in your hand. You can't play it for the next 2 turns.
